final_production_data.main_heading: Toy Tariffs Increase Costs and Constrain Supply
headlines: Basic Fun CEO Jay Foreman says US toy tariffs have increased costs and constrained supply heading into the holiday season
Tariffs could impact consumer spending during the holiday season
Stay tuned for more information on the impact of toy tariffs
final_production_data.tts_script: Basic Fun CEO Jay Foreman says US toy tariffs have increased costs and constrained supply heading into the holiday season.

original_raw_news.original_title: Tariffs Increasing Toy Costs: Basic Fun CEO
original_raw_news.original_summary:
Basic Fun CEO Jay Foreman says US toy tariffs have increased costs and constrained supply heading into the holiday season on "Bloomberg Markets" with Vonnie Quinn.

 (Source: Bloomberg)
